Maybe there's no need to integrate it in the code, because you can solve it like this:
- allready installed Rustdesk (tested with 1.3.8)
- Define a new external tool
- Display Name: Rustdesk
- Filename: "C:\Program Files\RustDesk\RustDesk.exe"
- Arguments (don't fail to see the exclamation mark at the !PASSWORD) :   --connect %HOSTNAME% --password %!PASSWORD%
- Only check at "Try to integrate"
